text: Roland Dumas (23 August 1922 - 3 July 2024) was a French lawyer and Socialist politician.French Socialists condemn ex-minister's Jewish remark , Reuters, February 16, 2015. He served as the Foreign Minister under President François Mitterrand from 1984 to 1986 and from 1988 to 1993. He was also President of the Constitutional Council from 1995 to 2000.ECtHR judgment in case Dumas v. France, 34875/07 He was born in Limoges, Haute-Vienne. Dumas turned 100 in August 2022. He died on 3 July 2024 in Paris, France at the age of 101. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1922 births Category:2024 deaths Category:French centenarians Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:French lawyers Category:Alumni of the Institut d'études politiques de Paris Category:People from Limoges
title: Roland Dumas
